meanings.definition: A person who studies or writes about myths.
meanings.sent1: The mythologers in the library were researching ancient stories.
meanings.sent2: Many mythologers enjoy exploring the tales of gods and heroes.
meanings.sent3: The mythologers had a myth-writing competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her storytelling was so captivating, she was like a mythologer of everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The mythologers' passion for myths was as bright as the sun.

meanings.sent1: We invited the mythologers to share their knowledge at the event.
meanings.sent2: The mythologers gathered to discuss their research on ancient legends.
meanings.sent3: The group of mythologers made a myth-themed cake for the party.
meanings.sent4: Their combined wisdom made them a council of mythologers.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as the mythologers exchanged stories.
